article: former boxing champion edwin valero , who had a spectacular career with ## straight knockouts and flouted a tattoo of president hugo chavez on his chest , hanged himself in his jail cell monday after being arrested for stabbing his wife to death , police said .
abstract: boxer valero kills himself in jail police say
